AltName.entry: STANDING CONFERENCE FOR COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT (FORMER NAME)

Desc.entry: A UK-wide membership organisation which aims to be a strong voice for community development. Supports the people who support communities. CDX members are practitioners, policy makers and researchers in community development along with volunteers, activists, campaigners and students. Delivers passionately in community development and its power to transform communities. Is a registered charity. Company limited by guarantee no 3895814. Self or any referral.

Pubs.entry: CDX Magazine; monthly e-bulletin and policy updates

ContactName.entry: Nick Beddow, Chief Executive Officer/Sophie Ballinger, Development Officer - Communities
